description: A World Government judicial island where the sun never sets, serving as one of three major government strongholds along with Impel Down and Marine Headquarters. It's connected via the Gates of Justice and serves as a gateway to the world's most feared prison.

keyEvents.title: Just Eleven Jurymen Attack Gomorrah
keyEvents.description: The elite forces under Baskerville attack and knock down Gomorrah, demonstrating the strength of Enies Lobby's defenders.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the formidable defensive forces protecting this World Government stronghold.

keyEvents.title: Giants Arrive as Reinforcements
keyEvents.description: Sogeking arrives with giants Kashii and Oimo, who have now switched sides to help the Straw Hats after learning they were deceived by the World Government.
keyEvents.significance: Marks a major shift in the battle as former defenders become attackers, weakening Enies Lobby's defenses.

keyEvents.title: Gomorrah's Charge Through Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: Gomorrah blindly charges through Enies Lobby, crashing through buildings to reach the courthouse courtyard.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the desperation and determination of the rescue effort as allies are willing to cause massive destruction to save Robin.

statusHistory.reason: Under assault by Straw Hats and allies during rescue operation

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー裁判所

description: The main courthouse building at Enies Lobby where the trials of accused criminals take place. It features a rooftop where Luffy engages CP9 in battle, and is flanked by two towers that control a bridge mechanism to the Tower of Justice.

keyEvents.title: Bridge Mechanism Revealed
keyEvents.description: Kokoro reveals that levers on the top floors of the two towers flanking the courthouse can lower a bridge connecting to the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial tactical information for the rescue operation, showing how the buildings are connected.

keyEvents.title: Chimney Spots Luffy on Courthouse Roof
keyEvents.description: Chimney reports seeing Luffy fighting on the courthouse rooftop, confirming his location to the other Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Helps coordinate the rescue team's movements by providing intelligence on Luffy's position.

keyEvents.title: Gomorrah Reaches Courthouse Courtyard
keyEvents.description: Gomorrah successfully reaches the courthouse courtyard despite being blind, delivering the Straw Hats' allies before collapsing.
keyEvents.significance: Completes a crucial phase of the rescue operation by getting allies to the courthouse.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Blueno Battle Continues
keyEvents.description: On the courthouse rooftop, Luffy continues his intense battle against CP9 member Blueno.
keyEvents.significance: The rooftop serves as the battleground for Luffy's confrontation with CP9, providing a dramatic elevated setting.

statusHistory.reason: Site of major battles during the Enies Lobby assault

description: The tallest and most heavily fortified building at Enies Lobby, housing the offices of the World Government officials and CP9 agents. Robin and Franky are held here, making it the primary target of the rescue operation.

keyEvents.title: Bridge Access Mechanism Explained
keyEvents.description: Kokoro reveals that the Tower of Justice can be accessed from the courthouse via a bridge that lowers when levers in the flanking towers are activated.
keyEvents.significance: Explains the architectural connection between the courthouse and Tower of Justice, crucial for planning the assault.

keyEvents.title: Spandam Gives Devil Fruits to CP9
keyEvents.description: Inside the Tower of Justice, Spandam presents unknown Devil Fruits to Kaku and Kalifa as rewards for their successful mission.
keyEvents.significance: The Tower serves as the location for a pivotal power-up moment that will change the upcoming battles.

keyEvents.title: Kaku and Kalifa Consume Devil Fruits
keyEvents.description: Within the Tower of Justice, Kaku and Kalifa eat their Devil Fruits, permanently gaining new abilities.
keyEvents.significance: This location witnesses the transformation of two CP9 agents into Devil Fruit users, fundamentally changing the power balance.

statusHistory.reason: Holding Robin and Franky, target of rescue operation
